gr.interamerican.bo2.utils
Class IllegalCharacterFilter

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.IllegalCharacterFilter

public class IllegalCharacterFilter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a defense mechanism to disallow the insertion of inappropriate characters to database tables.
This may happen, for instance, when users copy-paste formatted text from word documents to text areas.

registerAssociation

public static void registerAssociation(java.lang.Character filtered,
                                       java.lang.String replacement)
Extension point. Allows client applications to define new associations or override default ones. If an association for a Character that is normally omitted is made, the omission rule is canceled.

Parameters:
filtered -
replacement -
